setup_hint: ⚠️ Setup your emergency contact and message to enable automated safety alerts
next_alert_label: Next alert will be sent to your contact at:
already_checked_in: You have checked in today. Please come back tomorrow.
local_storage_warning: Note: RUOK? has no backend servers. All your settings are stored locally on this device. If you uninstall the app, all data will be permanently deleted.
err_no_email: Please set an emergency email in settings first.
default_message: I have been out of contact for {} days. Please check on me.
